comment._content:

comment.author: 66703097@N05
comment._content: Wow! Where did these photos come from? My great-grandfather came over on this ship in November 1914!

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Where did your great-grandfather come from, forlanghorn?  Thanks to Wystan for pulling together a group of the images of the ship.  For general information about the Bain News Agency please see the link below the photo.

comment.author: 66703097@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/ryan_loc] He was originally from Lebanon. Thanks for responding! Is there any way I can get access to the original of this photo? I'm definitely going to make or order a print for my family.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Sure. There are no restrictions on these images and they are downloadable from your home computer. If you'd like to purchase a copy, please see the link off of our homepage, www.loc.gov/rr/print/ You will need to note the call. no. of the image you select to copy, which follows the pattern LC-B2-3....
